website_summaries.verdict: A scrub and mask in one product that gently reveals younger-looking skin.
pros: Features wild strawberries to brighten skin, brown sugar to gently exfoliate, and plum seed and grapeseed oils to moisturize
Has a great smell and a little goes a long way
Doesn't dry out skin like other exfoliating products
cons: Some buyers with oily skin say there is a film left behind after rinsing

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Too rough on my face, made it very red even when I rubbed gently on. I requested a refund but they refused to take back even though I had a reaction to product. They said it was past the 30 day to refund. If you are. It happy with product request refund before the 30 day. Mine was 7 days past the 30 days. I had only used once.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Send this as a gift and she loves it that she orders it again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I've used Fresh products for awhile now and I love all of them
customer_reviews.text: I've used Fresh products for awhile now and I love all of them. Would recommend Fresh they are all quality products
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: A jar full of spa facials.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years and just ordered yet another jar from Amazon. It is pricey, but I figure I can get a whole jar full of facials, which are nearly as good as some I've had at the spa, for about half the cost of one spa facial. The product smells and feels great and leaves my face smooth and refreshed. I also like that it doesn't take forever if you don't want it to. It is particularly great to use in the dry winter months as it scrubs away dull winter skin and leaves your skin soft and plump.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: This product line rocks. I like it so much I bought several other products. I have switched from Lancôme to fresh!!
customer_reviews.author: jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Mask the taste is sweet, use after the skin is very smooth, the pores are smaller, really very good, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zhangjie

customer_reviews.title: Transportation is very fast, very fine goods packaging, appearance is very good
customer_reviews.text: Transportation is very fast, goods packaging is very fine, good appearance. Exfoliating effect is very good, taste is also very good, like!
customer_reviews.author: eternid

customer_reviews.title: I feel very confused about the top of the bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel very confused about the top of the bottle not matching the body of the bottle, neither are their color. I want to make sure the product itself is quality proved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, ok results.
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, not scratchy, and moisturizes well. Otherwise, not particularly impressive. If you have winter flakiness/dryness this would be better than a washcloth. If you really want to get serious about having a polished looking face, gets something with retinol or AHA/lactic acid/salicylic acid.
customer_reviews.author: laurapin

customer_reviews.title: great polish
customer_reviews.text: This sugar face polish is magical as my face shines like a midnight sun. I love the natural smoothness of this lotion as i apply it onto my face. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Rainn Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great scrub and non-toxic
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great scrub and non-toxic. I use it about 3 times a week, I apply before I get in the shower to let it sit for a bit. Skin feels great after.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Lynn Gray

customer_reviews.title: It is famous but I think some cheaper one are better for daily use
customer_reviews.text: It is famous but I think some cheaper one are better for daily use. I think I will keep it always and use it once or twice a week but not daily use.I find some cheaper mask sheets are more suitable for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: CHAOWEN CHEN

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but good if you do not have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Made my daughter break out so she gave it to me and I like it but seems very pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mason

customer_reviews.title: great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Having just tried this mask, it left the surface of my skin feeling unbelievable. However, not having used many masks in the past, the sensation of the tightening of my skin coupled with the wax used in the product could make for a feeling of residue as the other lady suggested. Once you get used to that sensation though - wow, what a nice treat for my skin!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Kaler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I never write a review. In fact, most face products I use take a while to grow on me. But this, by far is one of the best ones I have ever used. I can actually see such a big difference between the times I stop using it, v/s when I use it, that I cannot stop using it. It smells great, it does wonders to my skin, and it lasts a while. I will recommend this to all those with relatively dry and sometimes patchy skin. But this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love this scrub
customer_reviews.text: Love this scrub. Smells so good and after using it the skin really brightens up and dark spots become lighter. Wish price could even be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for exfoliation and moisturizing, leaves face smooth and non-flaky. Smells divine.
customer_reviews.author: mindreader

customer_reviews.title: Best love!
customer_reviews.text: This product is alwarys my favorite. It will keep my face comfortable and less feeling dry in the dry weather.
customer_reviews.author: xiao liu

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Smooth my skin after appling. but it's not that good as the rose or black tea.
customer_reviews.author: Xiang Jia

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: I used the best facial scrub contains exfoliating, moisturizing, nourishing, brighten, I love it, and the second bottle is running out.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: it is good.after i use it.my face feels smooth and looks white like an egg....and the taste is good.love it
customer_reviews.author: LIANG LINGXIA

customer_reviews.title: Soft, smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: Like all Fresh products I've used, I like this product a lot. It is not too harsh, smells great, and leaves the skin super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So regret buying it here. It sells much cheaper on Fresh official website.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Guo

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good for sensitive skin.. my face is so soft after put this product fir 10-15min.. but it is not dramatically good.. just for narmal good..
customer_reviews.author: hyun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic face scrub
customer_reviews.text: I love this face scrub! It smells nice, it feels nice when I use it. Most importantly, my skin feels better after I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Anne S

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff, but not organic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and have been through many jars of it, however, I looked it up on some other sites and saw some reviews that said it is organic. Not hardly! Propylene glycol is hardly organic.Use it, love it, but don't think it is organic!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J. Pavlus

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used many of the Fresh products and love them. The Sugar Face Polish is very cleansing and leaves your skin very smooth & soft. It invigorates your skin removing the dull & old! After a few uses you can definately see a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Incredible recovery/regeneration scrub
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, this scrub/mask does leave a residue. But so what? Especially if when you follow it with a mild toner and your favorite moisturizer, your complexion looks amazing?! Perfect for every few days when your skin needs to feel extra-loved. Fantastic product. Wait no more.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Burke

product_meta.title: Fresh Sugar Face Polish, 4.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: A nourishing mask with intense conditioning action. Delivers perfecting properties of real brown sugar. Loaded with brightening vitamin C from anti-oxidant rich strawberries. Extra moisturizing effects from grapeseed. mango and macadamia oils. Brings you a renewed skin with radiance and suppleness. Perfect for all skin types.
feature_bullets: A nourishing mask with intense conditioning action
Delivers perfecting properties of real brown sugar
Loaded with brightening vitamin C from anti-oxidant rich strawberries

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
